description:
Does Sovereignty Perfection Doll really love Shiraho, or does the curse just want to get her in a fatal embrace? Fear, Konoha and Kirika have a plan to solve the problem, but it looks like their solution is executing both cursed doll and girl!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nogare Unu Noroi no You na
逃れ得ぬ呪いのような
